About Aging Dog Health

We’re a small team of dog lovers and health writers helping you care for your senior dog.

Updated Sun Nov 02 2025

Aging Dog Health exists to help your best friend age with comfort and dignity. We publish plain-spoken guides on mobility, nutrition, pain relief, and daily care.

Our promise •⁠ ⁠Compassion first. •⁠ ⁠Evidence-informed, jargon-free writing. •⁠ ⁠Practical tips you can use today.

Learn more in our senior dog care guides.
